remarks: A closed subspace sum equals subspace join.  ( ~ shjshseli analog.) (Contributed by NM, 13-Aug-2014.)
statement:
djhlsmcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
djhlsmcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhlsmcl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
djhlsmcl.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
djhlsmcl.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
djhlsmcl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhlsmcl.j $e |- .\/ = ( ( joinH ` K ) ` W ) $.
djhlsmcl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
djhlsmcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
djhlsmcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. S ) $.
djhlsmcl $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X .(+) Y ) e. ran I <-> ( X .(+) Y ) = ( X .\/ Y ) ) ) $.
